msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Drag proxy should be stored always irrespective of whether drag is started in root application or not. However proxy is stored in the automation manager of the root app and root will return the proxy when it is asked for.
Fix: Earlier we were storing the proxy only if the application that initiated the application is root. Removed that check now.
Bugs: FLEXENT-1244 (Main app loads sub app1 in same app domain which loads sub app2 in different app domain drag and drop of list from sub app1 to sub app2 does not get replayed)

add 6 new DMV projects to the SDK:

These projects are setup to build in an ant main call.  There are currently several warnings in the datavisualization project that will be cleaned up.  No checkintests exist for these projects as of yet.

I also modified the exisitng projects build files for easier management of the localization targets, bundle and fat-swc. If the projects that I updated:airframework,airspark,framework,playerglobal,rpc,and spark.  All the new projects have been implemented this same way.
